Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #412345 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000C2F8y:ref - Need detail of Configuration Backup EPP DLP    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0C2F8y:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello,

You can set the backup to run periodically from "System Maintenance > System Backup".
First, enable System Backup from "Dashboard > System Status".
Then in System Backup select Backup Scheduler, select the interval and save.
You can also use the System Maintenance >  External Storage option to move the backup to a network share when it is created.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
